stocks.name: Enbridge Inc.
stocks.thesis: North America's largest pipeline network with inflation-linked contracts. Trading at a 12% discount to fair value with 7%+ yield locked in for years.
stocks.risks: Rate sensitivity; regulatory approval risk on new projects

stocks.name: Toronto-Dominion Bank
stocks.thesis: Second-largest Canadian bank at a significant discount due to AML overhang — temporary issue, permanent discount. Dividend has grown every year for 20+ years.
stocks.risks: US regulatory overhang from AML consent order; US consumer credit exposure

stocks.name: BCE Inc.
stocks.thesis: Highest yield in telecom at a 30-year price low. Dividend reset incoming but even at 50% cut still yields 5.7%. Bond proxy for income investors once rates stabilize.
stocks.risks: Dividend cut likely in 2026; heavy debt load from fiber build-out

stocks.name: Canadian National Railway
stocks.thesis: Best-in-class rail network with pricing power above inflation. Essential infrastructure with 30%+ operating margins and consistent buybacks.
stocks.risks: Economic slowdown reduces freight volumes; precision railroading execution risk

stocks.name: Fortis Inc.
stocks.thesis: 49 consecutive years of dividend growth — one of the longest streaks in North America. Regulated utilities in US and Canada, near-zero earnings volatility.
stocks.risks: Rate sensitivity; regulated return compression if regulators get aggressive
